Open Source Licenses 👩‍💻

May 1, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • open source

Nehemiah Dacres, Open Source advocate and Captain of the OpenSTL Code for America joins us for a chat about Open Source licenses. We’ll learn about their varying types as well as why they can be useful for your projects.
